name: TDIRPAssets
description:
Assorted RP Assets.
Includes bandage pieces as armour and accessory as needed.
Discord https://discord.gg/XEUZxZRVF9

Weapons are *mostly* the same as my weapon pack, but "balanced" by giving them mostly the same stats as Star metal, and with the texture sets "blinged" up for the more fantasy settings.  I recommend against using both mods.

Thanks to Tuka for the dragon tattoo image

Accessories based on Whiskey's accessory system, big thanks to Whiskey for creating it, and letting others use it.  Accessory mod here https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2098700751
Whiskey's Discord https://discord.gg/tAJZAjq
changeNote:
Text tidy up.- descriptions and such more filled in.
added reinforce stone machic end piece, extending the wall out chopped at 45 degrees for making corners.
Started adding black Ice versions of machicolations, merlons, and arrow slits
author: Tiktaalik Dreaming
